column4: audiotestsrc wave=sine freq=512 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! gconfaudiosink: Could not open resource for writing.
yes k3b is great for burning anything and everything.
so is there a way to reload audio drivers somehow? any ideas on how I can troubleshoot my audio not working all of a sudden? The alternative is to restart.
you can check system logs in /var/log and dmesg
